name: Crazy Juicer
description:
Slice, cut or slash fruits! Let's make tasty juice!

Fruit Crazy Juicer is a classic arcade game exclusively designed for fruit game fans. The gameplay is more than easy. Tap to start, time your hits and slice all moving fruits at a time to make fresh juice!

A glass of juice is made each time you finish a level. After 4 glasses are done, you get a chance to spin a lucky wheel and collect rare rewards!

What are you waiting for? Just slice it and be the master of fruit juice!
